name: @ismail-elkorchi/ui-docs
description: UIK documentation site and dogfooding lab.
author: Ismail El Korchi

scripts.deps:build: cd ../.. && npm -w packages/ui-tokens run build && npm -w packages/ui-primitives run build && npm -w packages/ui-shell run build && npm -w packages/ui-patterns run build
scripts.test: npm run perf:check && npm run lighthouse:check && vitest --run --project browser --config ../../vitest.config.ts --dir .
scripts.prebuild: npm run deps:build && npm run generate:baseline && npm run generate:content
scripts.predev: npm run deps:build && npm run generate:baseline && npm run generate:content
scripts.pretest: npm run deps:build && npm run generate:baseline && npm run generate:content
